languages.text: [Возвысить голос] "Империум окружен врагами! Они многочисленны, коварны, завистливы! Кто виноват в вашем голоде? Они! Но мы, верные слуги Императора, сильнее их козней! Упрямее! Стойче! Затянем пояса, сплотимся и превозможем! Так?!"

[Raise your voice] "The Imperium is surrounded by enemies! They are many, they are cunning, and they are spiteful! Who is to blame for your hungry days? They are! But we, the Emperor's faithful servants, are stronger than their scheming ways! We are steadfast! We will not yield! We will tighten our belts, stand as one, and prevail! Who is with me?"
languages.original_text: [Возвысить голос] "Империум окружен врагами! Они многочисленны, коварны, завистливы! Кто виноват в вашем голоде? Они! Но мы, верные слуги Императора, сильнее их козней! Упрямее! Стойче! Затянем пояса, сплотимся и превозможем! Так?!"

languages.text: [Stimme erheben] "Das Imperium ist von Feinden umgeben! Sie sind viele, listenreich und voller Hass! Wer trägt die Schuld an Eurem Hunger? Sie! Aber wir, die treuen Diener des Imperators, sind stärker als ihre Machenschaften. Wir sind standhaft! Wir weichen nicht zurück! Wir schnallen unsere Gürtel enger und werden Seite an Seite siegen! Wer folgt mir?"
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "The Imperium is surrounded by enemies! They are many, they are cunning, and they are spiteful! Who is to blame for your hungry days? They are! But we, the Emperor's faithful servants, are stronger than their scheming ways! We are steadfast! We will not yield! We will tighten our belts, stand as one, and prevail! Who is with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Stimme erheben] "Das Imperium ist von Feinden umgeben! Sie sind viele, listenreich und voller Hass! Wer trägt die Schuld an Eurem Hunger? Sie! Aber wir, die treuen Diener des Imperators, sind stärker als ihre Machenschaften. Wir sind standhaft! Wir weichen nicht zurück! Wir schnallen unsere Gürtel enger und werden Seite an Seite siegen! Wer folgt mir?"

languages.text: [Élever la voix] « L'Imperium est cerné par ses ennemis ! Et ils sont nombreux, rusés et perfides ! Qui devez-vous blâmer pour la faim qui déchire vos entrailles ? Eux ! Mais les fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur que nous sommes ne nous laisserons pas abuser par leurs manigances ! Nous sommes résolus ! Nous ne céderons pas ! Nous nous serrerons la ceinture, nous resterons unis et nous vaincrons ! Qui est avec moi ? »
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "The Imperium is surrounded by enemies! They are many, they are cunning, and they are spiteful! Who is to blame for your hungry days? They are! But we, the Emperor's faithful servants, are stronger than their scheming ways! We are steadfast! We will not yield! We will tighten our belts, stand as one, and prevail! Who is with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Élever la voix] « L'Imperium est cerné par ses ennemis ! Et ils sont nombreux, rusés et perfides ! Qui devez-vous blâmer pour la faim qui déchire vos entrailles ? Eux ! Mais les fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur que nous sommes ne nous laisserons pas abuser par leurs manigances ! Nous sommes résolus ! Nous ne céderons pas ! Nous nous serrerons la ceinture, nous resterons unis et nous vaincrons ! Qui est avec moi ? »

languages.text: [Levantar la voz] «¡El Imperium está rodeado de enemigos! ¡Son legión, son astutos y nos odian! ¿Quién tiene la culpa de que paséis hambre? ¡Todos ellos! ¡Pero nosotros, los fieles siervos del Emperador, somos más fuertes que ninguna de sus conjuras! ¡Nos mantenemos firmes! ¡Nunca claudicamos! ¡Nos apretaremos el cinturón, levantaremos la cabeza y prevaleceremos! ¿Quién está conmigo?».
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "The Imperium is surrounded by enemies! They are many, they are cunning, and they are spiteful! Who is to blame for your hungry days? They are! But we, the Emperor's faithful servants, are stronger than their scheming ways! We are steadfast! We will not yield! We will tighten our belts, stand as one, and prevail! Who is with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Levantar la voz] «¡El Imperium está rodeado de enemigos! ¡Son legión, son astutos y nos odian! ¿Quién tiene la culpa de que paséis hambre? ¡Todos ellos! ¡Pero nosotros, los fieles siervos del Emperador, somos más fuertes que ninguna de sus conjuras! ¡Nos mantenemos firmes! ¡Nunca claudicamos! ¡Nos apretaremos el cinturón, levantaremos la cabeza y prevaleceremos! ¿Quién está conmigo?».

languages.text: [声を張り上げる]「帝国は敵に包囲されている！敵は多く、狡猾であり、悪意に満ちている！空腹の日々は誰のせいだ？敵だ！だが我らは、皇帝の忠実なる従者は、連中の狡猾さよりも賢い！我らは揺るがない！屈しない！節制し、一丸となって立ち向かい、勝利するのだ！共に来る者はいるか？」
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "The Imperium is surrounded by enemies! They are many, they are cunning, and they are spiteful! Who is to blame for your hungry days? They are! But we, the Emperor's faithful servants, are stronger than their scheming ways! We are steadfast! We will not yield! We will tighten our belts, stand as one, and prevail! Who is with me?"

traits.locale_text: [声を張り上げる]「帝国は敵に包囲されている！敵は多く、狡猾であり、悪意に満ちている！空腹の日々は誰のせいだ？敵だ！だが我らは、皇帝の忠実なる従者は、連中の狡猾さよりも賢い！我らは揺るがない！屈しない！節制し、一丸となって立ち向かい、勝利するのだ！共に来る者はいるか？」

languages.text: [提高音量]“帝国已经被敌人包围了！敌人很多，他们很狡猾、很恶毒！你们饿着肚子，这是谁的错？这都是他们的错！但我们，我们是帝皇的忠仆！我们比那些诡计多端的敌人更加强大！我们坚定不移！我们宁死不屈！我们会勒紧裤带，团结一心，取得胜利！谁愿意和我一起报效帝国？”
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "The Imperium is surrounded by enemies! They are many, they are cunning, and they are spiteful! Who is to blame for your hungry days? They are! But we, the Emperor's faithful servants, are stronger than their scheming ways! We are steadfast! We will not yield! We will tighten our belts, stand as one, and prevail! Who is with me?"

traits.locale_text: [提高音量]“帝国已经被敌人包围了！敌人很多，他们很狡猾、很恶毒！你们饿着肚子，这是谁的错？这都是他们的错！但我们，我们是帝皇的忠仆！我们比那些诡计多端的敌人更加强大！我们坚定不移！我们宁死不屈！我们会勒紧裤带，团结一心，取得胜利！谁愿意和我一起报效帝国？”

languages.text: [Sesini yükselt] "İmparatorluk'un dört bir yanını düşmanlar çevirmiş! Sayıları çok. Hepsi kurnaz, hepsi kindar! Aç geçirdiğiniz günlerin sorumlusu kim? Tabii ki onlar! Ancak İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârları olan bizler, onların entrikalarından daha güçlüyüz! Biz kararlıyız! Biz boyun eğmeyiz! Kemer sıkarız, hepimiz bir oluruz ve üstesinden geliriz! Kimler benimle hemfikir?"
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "The Imperium is surrounded by enemies! They are many, they are cunning, and they are spiteful! Who is to blame for your hungry days? They are! But we, the Emperor's faithful servants, are stronger than their scheming ways! We are steadfast! We will not yield! We will tighten our belts, stand as one, and prevail! Who is with me?"
